result.purpose: Responsible for providing a client interface to interact with wallet services, managing user balances, activities, and NFT items.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating wallet service interactions and data models within separate files for better organization and maintainability.

internal/infras/walletproxy/client.go.purpose: Defines a client for interacting with wallet services, handling user balances, activities, and NFT items.

internal/infras/walletproxy/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling wallet proxy requests and responses related to fiat tokens and fungible balances.
